title: Thambi
writer: Sameer Arora, Nani Challagulla, Renzil D'Silva
short_cast: Jyothika, Sathyaraj, Karthi, Showkar Janaki, Nikhila Vimal, Havarasu, Anson Paul
cast: Jyothika, Sathyaraj, Karthi, Showkar Janaki, Nikhila Vimal, Havarasu, Anson Paul
m_desc: Suitable for persons aged 16 and above and under parental guidance for people under age of 16
desc: As a tip leads a local politician to his long-estranged son, his daughter has doubts about whether the young man is truly family or just an impostor.
